alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 1:20PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...An outflow boundary will impact portions of southwestern Harrison and southeastern Hancock Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from near Long Beach to near Waveland. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead and Shoreline Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 11 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
